quote: Working closely with Nicholas was like having a true partner in product. Together we elevated design across our company and the startups we guided, and built processes that united product, design and engineering.
author: Luca Dabra

quote: Nicholas helped us resolve years of design and technical debt in our video app. Thanks to his redesign, development speed increased by 40% and content creation time dropped by half.
author: Julien Comte

quote: Nicholas brought clarity to our roadmap and aligned product with vision. His structured design process improved collaboration across teams and helped us cut release cycles by 25%.
author: Lucile Voisin

quote: Working one-to-one with Nicholas turned our idea into a product. In three months, we shipped the first version of our editing app, cutting delivery time by 30%.
author: Matthieu Gindre
